1370: Hildebolding was born in Papenhofstede in 1370.
Got married to Machtilden at age 26 in 1370.
Had a son with Machtilden, Richolfus, at age 26.
1371: Had a daughter with Machtilden, Truden, at age 27.
1372: Had a son with Machtilden, Ghodekin, at age 28.
1374: Had a son with Machtilden, Ringot, at age 30.
1375: Had a son with Machtilden, Ricward, at age 31.
1378: Had a daughter with Machtilden, Flore, at age 34.
1380: Had a son with Machtilden, Ebram, at age 36.
1381: Lost son Ebram when Ebram was 2 years old.
